item.name: VIM Shortcuts
item.autogen: __DoublePressModifier__ KeyCode::Y, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_SHIFT | VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::C, VK_COMMAND
__DoublePressModifier__ KeyCode::D, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_SHIFT | VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::X, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::DELETE, VK_COMMAND
__DoublePressModifier__ KeyCode::P, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::E, VK_CONTROL, KeyCode::RETURN, KeyCode::V, VK_COMMAND
__DoublePressModifier__ KeyCode::C, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_SHIFT | VK_COMMAND, KeyCode::X, VK_COMMAND
